title: Burn to Ashes
description: A love risen from the ashes of chaos…  Kari finds herself thrust violently into a world of extreme anarchy as rival motorcycle clubs war for dominance. When her only savior in the hell storm is suddenly no longer safe, she makes a run for her life.  But the world is much darker than she ever could’ve imagined, and she’s forced to beg for the help of the last man she’d ever expected to protect her…a dangerous and heinous outlaw biker, one who knows no code of honor.  This contemporary Biker romance contains graphic sexual content and violence. It is intended for mature readers.
author: Brynn O'Connor
